Html:
Hi there,

     I have been using NAudio for a mixing and it has been working very well.  NAudio tickles me to death.  Great work!  One of the features I need is to be able to change the BPM(beats per minute) of a mixed song.  I looked through the code and forum and just couldn't see how this is done.  Is this possible? 

Thanks.

Huj
I'm afraid NAudio doesn't have this capability
